name: Pbjs
tagline: Add, A/B Test PB Integrations without writing code.
body:
## Why Prebid.js?

### 1. No more engineering work for new pre-bid integrations.
![](http://i.imgur.com/XxklGc7.png)

### 2. Prebid.js already minimized latency for you.
Before prebid.js:
* total latency 1100ms
* Blocking calls by pre-bid partners
![](http://i.imgur.com/rk34RaF.png)

After prebid.js:
* total latency 250ms
* All non-blocking parallel calls
![](http://i.imgur.com/AcMidpd.png)

### 3. Turn on/off, A/B test pre-bid partners without touching the actual code.
![](http://i.imgur.com/fm1uMFL.png)

## Documentation

###Basics
